===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|小|隹|t1=small|t2=bird|ls=ic}} – a small bird, a sparrow. Note that the upper part looks like [[少]], but what looks like the bottom of 少 is actually the upper left stroke of 隹, extended.
